movies.title: Ésimésac
movies.plot: The residents of Saint-Élie-de-Caxton have barely enough food to survive. In the spring, one villager convinces the community to come together and plant a garden to grow enough food for all of them.
movies.simplePlot: The residents of Saint-Élie-de-Caxton have barely enough food to survive. In the spring, one villager convinces the community to come together and plant a garden to grow enough food for all of them.

biography.bio: Nicola-Frank Vachon is an actor, known for Ésimésac (2012), The Necessities of Life (2008) and Heat Wave (2009).
biography.name: Nicola-Frank Vachon

biography.bio: Gildor Roy was born on May 11, 1960 in Rigaud, Québec, Canada. He is an actor, known for Requiem pour un beau sans-coeur (1992), Karmina 2 (2001) and Karmina (1996).
biography.name: Gildor Roy

biography.bio: Luc Picard was born on September 24, 1961 in Lachine, Québec, Canada. He is an actor and director, known for Audition (2005), A Sunday in Kigali (2006) and February 15, 1839 (2001).
biography.name: Luc Picard

biography.bio: Sophie Nélisse was born in Windsor, Ontario, but moved to Montreal with her family when she was just age 4. She began her career at the age of seven in commercials, then made her movie debut at age 10 in the 2012 French-Canadian film Monsieur Lazhar. For her performance in the film, she won a Genie and a Jutra award for Best Supporting Actress. Sophie then went on to play a role in Luc Picard's 2012 feature Esimésac before being asked to audition for the lead role of a German girl in the English-language feature film The Book Thief. She landed the part and starred alongside Geoffrey Rush and Emily Watson. When not working, Sophie enjoys gymnastic classes. Her younger sister, Isabelle, is also an actress, who, among other credits, played a lead role in the 2013 horror movie Mama.
biography.name: Sophie Nélisse

biography.bio: Marie-Chantal Perron was born on February 1, 1967 in Châteauguay, Québec, Canada. She is an actress, known for The Mysterious Miss C. (2002), Borderline (2008) and Babine (2008).
biography.name: Marie-Chantal Perron

biography.bio: Marie Brassard is an actress and writer, known for Le polygraphe (1996), Vic + Flo Saw a Bear (2013) and Corbo (2014).
biography.name: Marie Brassard

biography.bio: Maude Laurendeau is an actress, known for Babine (2008), Ésimésac (2012) and The Secret Pact (2001).
biography.name: Maude Laurendeau

biography.bio: René Richard Cyr was born on September 27, 1958. He is an actor and writer, known for Babine (2008), Ésimésac (2012) and Nuit de noces (2001).
biography.name: René Richard Cyr

biography.bio: Alain Sauvage is an actor, known for Audition (2005), Ésimésac (2012) and Elvis Gratton 3: Le retour d'Elvis Wong (2004).
biography.name: Alain Sauvage

biography.bio: Isabel Richer was born on June 14, 1966. She is an actress, known for Trauma (2010), La loi du cochon (2001) and The 3 L'il Pigs (2007).
biography.name: Isabel Richer

biography.bio: Denis Trudel was born on July 18, 1963. He is an actor, known for C.R.A.Z.Y. (2005), February 15, 1839 (2001) and La lâcheté (2007).
biography.name: Denis Trudel

biography.bio: Olivier Chartrand is an actor, known for Sur le fil (2011) and Ésimésac (2012).
biography.name: Olivier Chartrand

biography.bio: Pierre Collin was born on July 18, 1938 in Montréal, Québec, Canada as Pierre Hermasse Collin. He is an actor, known for Seducing Doctor Lewis (2003), Post Mortem (1999) and La Lili à Gilles (2007). He has been married to Sylvie Houle since December 8, 2001.
biography.name: Pierre Collin

biography.bio: Maurice Daoust is an actor, known for Ésimésac (2012).
biography.name: Maurice Daoust

biography.bio: Hugo Giroux is an actor, known for L'affaire Dumont (2012), Horloge biologique (2005) and Curling (2010).
biography.name: Hugo Giroux

categories.category: Best Supporting Actor (Meilleur Acteur de Soutien)
